text: Freyanidae is a family of feather mites in the order Astigmata. There are more than 15 genera in Freyanidae. ==Genera== These genera belong to the family Freyanidae: * Allofreyana Gaud and Atyeo, 1975 * Burhinacarus, Dubinin, 1956 * Cauralicola Gaud & Atyeo, 1981 * Cernyella, Gaud, 1968 * Diomedacarinae Gaud & Atyeo, 1981 * Diomedacarus, Dubinin, 1949 * Dobyella Gaud et Atyeo, 1975 * Freyana Haller, 1877 * Freyanomorpha, Gaud, 1957 * Freyanopsis Dubinin, 1950 * Michaelia Trouessart, 1884 * Morinyssus Gaud & Atyeo, 1982 * Parafreyana Cerny, 1969 * Pavlovskiana Dubinin, 1950 * Pelecymerus Gaud and Atyeo, 1975 * Sulanyssus Dubinin, 1953 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * Category:Acari
title: Freyanidae
